price: Na Soro abͻfoͻ bɛgyina-gyina ne ntweaso, na (Soro abͻfoͻ) nwͻtwe na wͻbεsoa wo Wura Nyankopͻn Ahennwa no wͻ wͻn apampamu saa da no.
arabic: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wal-malaku ʿalā arjāihā wayaḥmilu ʿarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamāniyatun
